AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Combatant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa combatant, a well-trained and determined warrior.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Frontline Officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa frontline officer, responsible for building fortifications.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Scout
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa scout, eyes and ears on the field.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Logistics Officer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa logistics officer. Her duty is confidential, because everyone pretends foods are not needed.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Commander
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa commander. She does not spend much time on trivia.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Deserter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa deserter. She has some questions about the goal of this organization.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Executioner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa executioner. She takes care of the ones who ask too many questions.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Hacker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa hacker. She provides intelligence support for operations.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa healer, "reparing" the wounds.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice YoRHa Operator
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a YoRHa operator, not designed for combat.
